QuestData.Title: Just Ptrust Me On This
QuestData.Description:
Ahhh, it is good to see you, $n.
How is de defective one? Still pleased to be at your side?
I have given this some thought. Fear may still be what holds your not-so-little one back, but your love is what enables him to thrive without his wings. Perhaps that love will be what restores him to de skies.
I am asking you to trust me. I wish to try something.
If I am correct then de two of you will find yourselves airborne as nature intended!
QuestData.LogDescription: Place your faith in Pa'ku and Kua'fon.
